sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../user'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form-page', templateUrl: './form-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form-page.component.css'] }) export class FormPageComponent { isSuccess = false; customer: User = { name: '', email: '', phone: '' }; submitForm(form: any) { if (form.valid) { console.log('Form Submitted', this.customer); } this.isSuccess = true; } }

Customer Form

Name is required
Email is required
Phone number is required

Customer Details

Name: {{ customerForm.value.name }}

Email: {{ customerForm.value.email }}

Phone: {{ customerForm.value.phone }}
